title: Interpretation of seeing a head in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the head in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Scientists and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through the vision website roy2a.com, where seeing the human head in a dream differed. For unmarried and married girls, pregnant women, men, and single young men. Interpretation of seeing a head in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a large head in a dream. It indicates that the dreamer has a large and prominent position among people. Seeing a small head in a dream indicates that the fortuneteller is a person with a weak character and will and does not care about anything. Something around him. Head uncovered in a dream. It indicates that the dreamer is far from his Lord and that he has done many bad things in his life. Seeing an upside down head in a dream indicates that the dreamer will face many difficulties in trying to achieve his goals. Removing the head from its place in the dream indicates that the fortuneteller will suffer losses. Great financial gain in the coming period. A severed head in a dream indicates the emergence of many promising things in the dreamer’s practical life. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing a kiss on the head in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a head in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi interpreted seeing a head falling off in a dream indicates that the dreamer does not care about his children and family. A human head turning into a dog’s head in a dream indicates many fears and anxieties in the dreamer’s life. Seeing a conversation with the head in a dream indicates many happy events in the dreamer’s life. A hole in the head in a dream indicates the dreamer’s success in something he was struggling for. For a long time. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing a wound in the head in a dream. What is the interpretation of a married woman who sees her head in a dream? Seeing a married woman’s head in a dream recalls major disagreements with her husband and her thoughts of divorce. A married woman seeing her head in a dream is a sign of her debts and her great need to help others. And bring her money. A married woman seeing her hair falling from her head in a dream is an indication of her dissatisfaction with her life and her idea of ​​changing it completely. Seeing baldness in a dream for a married woman expresses a feeling of anxiety and extreme sadness. What is the interpretation of seeing the head of a pregnant woman in a dream? Seeing a woman holding a head in a dream shows that she will give birth. A beautiful, healthy baby girl. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream with a lot of hair falling from her head means thinking differently about her husband and trying to stabilize the relationship between them. What is the interpretation of one person seeing his head in a dream? Seeing one girl bald in a dream indicates psychological exhaustion and many problems and fears in her life Seeing one girl bald in a dream indicates a constant feeling of sadness and depression. An unmarried woman seeing her head in a dream indicates problems in her relationship with her fiancé and her thinking of staying away from him. Seeing hair falling from the head in a dream is one of the beautiful visions that symbolize changing her life for the better and getting rid of her problems permanently. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a head in a dream? Seeing an unmarried girl with a bald head in a dream expresses her sadness at the loss of her entire family in a tragic accident. Seeing

title: Interpretation of a dream of a married woman whose husband marries her again

preview.html: And today on our topic from the website gptafser.com/ we will learn about different interpretations by many dream interpreters regarding the interpretation of a dream of a married woman whose husband marries her again. Interpretation of seeing a married woman being married by her husband inside. A dream for a single girl: seeing an unmarried girl in her dream that she is marrying her fiancé who is actually engaged. To him. The vision in her is an indication that she will actually get married soon in her real life. It also indicates the end of all the problems that were blocking their way to marriage. It is also an indication of the end of problems, as the girl lives a life full of happiness and fun with her fiancé after marriage. Seeing a girl in The dream that she was getting married and she was not satisfied, and her husband in the dream was an old man. The vision expresses that the girl is designed to do the things she was made to do. It also indicates that there is an internal conflict with the same girl that she is suffering from in her life. A girl seeing in her dream that her fiancé is marrying a girl Another was in a state of crying and sadness. The vision is good news for the dreamer, because it indicates the presence of goodness in the girl’s life. As well as the young man who was with her in the dream of “her fiancé.” See also: Interpretation of seeing marriage in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Watch the performance of a married woman marrying her husband in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman In her dream that her husband is marrying her for the second time. The vision is an indication of the positive changes and renewals that will soon occur in the married woman’s life. It also indicates renewed love and tenderness between her and her husband because she will be happy with her life with him. Seeing a woman in her dream marrying her husband. The vision shows good nutrition. The vision will also indicate that the married woman will get pregnant soon, and her pregnancy and child will be a reason for her happiness. Likewise, seeing a married woman in her dream means that she will marry him once. Again. The dream is evidence that there are no problems between her and her husband. The end of all arguments and that she will be happy in her life next time and live a calm and stable life. Seeing a married woman in a dream that she is marrying a man who is not really her husband and does not know him. The vision is a sign that the dreamer will soon become ill. Illness. Seeing her in a dream marrying someone other than her husband, and he was aware of the truth. The vision indicates that there is kindness and provision for her and her husband in reality. The vision can be interpreted as an indication of a married woman’s pregnancy with a male child. In the event that a married woman sees in a dream that she is marrying a ruler or A position or a president. The vision in it is an indication that the husband will soon obtain a large position or property and will have a say and power in society. In the event that a married woman is already afflicted with some disease, and she dreamed of a vision that she would get married, but she did not see the man she would marry. And the vision in it An indication of the imminent death of the dreamer, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman in her dream that her husband is marrying another woman. She was very beautiful, and at the same time the woman looked at them in her sleep and cried bitterly. The vision indicates abundance.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing theft in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Stealing in a dream: There is no doubt that stealing is a hateful act and a great sin that deserves repentance and seeking forgiveness. A person may see himself stealing in a dream or see someone stealing it and notice what was stolen from him specifically, and hence the meanings. This vision differed. In some cases, the vision is considered objectionable, and in other cases, in this article we take a look at all the indicators and special cases to see the theft in more detail and explanation. Its throughout his day, the situations and events he experiences, and the extent of transactions. With the crises that he faces in the reality of his life. Whoever sees theft, this indicates the loss of something he loves or the loss of what he loves, and he cannot leave it. The theft could be an indication of the absence of a family member, either because he moved to another house of his own. At the time of marriage, or leaving the house on an emergency trip, or to meet his master if he condemns him. And whoever sees that he is stealing, this deserves praise if he is one of the people of justice and piety, and did not intend to steal, deceive, or take away the rights of others. And if she sees someone trying to steal from him, and she is unable to do that This is a sign of escaping from an imminent danger, salvation from the evil that surrounds him, achieving a goal that she seeks through her heart, and she can escape from death or recover from a serious illness after despair and hopelessness. Theft in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that theft has more than one face. Its interpretations include absence, loss, abandonment, losing what is at hand, stealing what is under the right hand, interfering in the lives of others, and accompanying people with curiosity and conversation. And useless talk. This vision, in its interpretation, relates to what has been stolen. If a person sees his Qur’an stolen, it indicates failure in worship and delay in prayer. If the thief is unknown, this indicates the angel of death, but if the thief is known, it indicates the thief’s benefit from the stolen property, and it may be The benefit to him is in the knowledge he acquires, or the experience he gains, or the advice he benefits from. As for stealing money, it expresses the disappearance of worry and distress or that the fool is deceived, and whoever sees that he is chasing the thief and then killing him, this means that he will defeat him and win. Reaping the benefits and recovering from illness after hardships and hardships. What does stealing in a dream mean for a single woman? Stealing in a dream for single people indicates marriage or engagement in the coming days and that they will have a period full of responsibilities and duties assigned to them and they may not be skilled with them or perform them incorrectly. It leads Stealing from unmarried women means bad behavior and behavior, wrong appreciation of facts, following desires, clinging to desire and satisfying one’s calling, forgetting one’s duties, and neglecting the rights of others. If he sees that he is stealing food, this indicates that he is learning to cook new varieties, and if he sees that he is stealing Gold, this indicates a tendency to hear praise and praise for nothing without deserving praise. For. Theft in a dream for a married woman. To see theft in

title: Interpretation of seeing white hair in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of white hair in a dream: If you lose a loved one, then white hair means the return of the absent person. The appearance of white hair means that you will live a long time and the dream shows the respect you enjoy among people. If you are young, white hair means knowledge, wisdom and longevity. Dream of white hair Interpretation Seeing white hair in a dream for an unmarried woman means changes in her life, but for the worse. Likewise, if the hair becomes white, it is a sign of nourishment and blessing in her life. If the girl is an employee, the dream means that she will get a promotion at her job. If her hair turns white, this It indicates her marriage to a respectable man. A dream about white hair for a married woman. White hair in a dream for a married woman is evidence of the presence of a woman with a disreputable reputation and his spite wants her to marry him or her. If she sees that her hair has become completely white, the interpreters believe that there is no good thing in this. The dream, because it may indicate a distressed situation, poverty, and illness, and if a married woman sees that her hair is completely white and she turns into an old lady, this indicates the big problems that she will face. The future. A dream about white hair for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of dreams about white hair for a pregnant woman means that this lady will have children. These boys will be the cause of the main problems and issues that she will face. If she sees that his chin is white, this is a sign of many problems that he will face. If she sees that her husband has squint If his hair turns completely white, this means that she will face problems with that man. Interpretation of a dream about white hair in a dream: White hair in general means death, especially if there is a family member suffering from a long and severe illness and cannot find relief for him. For your financial circumstances, but to solve this problem, perhaps it will be a warning for you to give alms to the poor, and give them alms from what God has bestowed upon you. White hair contains wisdom and dignity, and perhaps a sign that you will soon enjoy a high position. Interpretation of a dream about white hair for a woman: In general, women are afraid if they see their hair turning white, but there are different indicators, for example, if white hair is long, this is evidence of long Age, and the older the woman, the more experience and ability to solve. The problems that stand in its way.

title: Interpretation of a dream about my beloved feeding me with his hand in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of my beloved feeding me with his hand in a dream. There are different meanings that express the interpretation of a dream of my beloved feeding me with his hand in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of my beloved feeding me with his hand in a dream. Interpretation of dreams of my beloved feeding me with his hand in a dream. Feeding someone with his hand because you can represent goodness and sustenance, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a girl sees She is not married to someone who feeds her with his hand, so this may be a sign of her good deeds, and God knows best. When you see someone feeding you with his hand, this may represent the fulfillment of desires, God willing. Also, seeing someone feeding you with his hand in a dream could indicate his love, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my father feeding me with his hand in a dream. Interpretation Dreaming of my father feeding me with his hand in a dream could be a sign of friendship and love, and God knows best. If a young man sees his father feeding him with his hand, it may turn into friendship, and God knows the unseen. When a married woman sees a father feeding his son with his hand in a dream, this may represent a good relationship with him, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If she sees an unmarried girl Her father feeding her with his hand in a dream, so this may be a sign of love from the father to his daughter and vice versa, and God knows the unseen.Interpretation of a dream about my husband feeding me with his hand in a dreamInterpretation of dreams about my husband feeding me with his hand in a dream To see someone feeding someone with your hand can indicate goodness and living, God willing, where if A married woman sees someone eating it with his hand, this may lead to blessing, and God knows the unseen. When an unmarried girl sees someone eating her from his hand in a dream, this may indicate kindness, God willing. If a divorced woman sees someone eating it from his hand, it may represent friendship and love, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about eating food in a house His uncle in a dream: Interpretation of dreams about eating at his uncle’s house in a dream, and it tastes good. It may refer to situations and confrontations of the dreamer, and God knows the unseen. Such as seeing good food in his uncle’s house in a dream can express kindness, and God knows best. When you see yourself eating with your relatives, it may mean that he will be able to achieve goals, and God is Most High and most knowledgeable. Seeing entering your uncle’s house It may indicate the benefits that he obtains, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about eating in the enemy’s house in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about eating in the enemy’s house in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see that. However, the vision of entering the enemy’s house can be attributed to his elusive nature, and God knows the unseen. If a young man sees himself in Dreaming about him entering the enemy’s house, this may indicate the necessity of seeking forgiveness, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees in a dream entering the enemy’s house, he can express his sadness, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream of shaking hands with an enemy in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of shaking hands with an enemy in a dream could indicate getting rid of Problems and reconciliation, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is shaking hands with an enemy, this may represent a shift in hostility, and God knows the unseen. When a single girl dreams of shaking hands with an enemy, this may be a sign of love, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees himself shaking hands with the enemy, this may lead to Love and friendship, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. title: Interpretation of a dream about hair appearing on the chin for one girl

preview.html: The appearance of hair on the chin and mustache is one of the undesirable things that cause a lot of embarrassment to the girl, and this is what we will learn about in the following lines of our website. Interpretation of a dream about the appearance of hair on the chin for a single girl. Interpretation scholars say that the appearance of hair on the chin for a single girl in a dream is evidence of... Many disturbances and anxieties in her life. A beard in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence of the strength of her character, her ability to solve problems and crises, and her hard effort to achieve her goals. If a girl’s chin hair causes harm in a dream, she is surrounded by many toxic relationships and bad people and must be careful. White hair on the chin in an unmarried woman’s dream is not worthy of praise. It indicates that she is not married and that she remains alone without a partner or children even in old age. Whoever sees in her dream hair far from the chin, and is not satisfied with her appearance. She suffers from depression and isolation and her mental state is bad. See also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing shaving a beard in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a beard and mustache in a woman’s dream. Imam Ibn Sirin says that the beard in a woman’s dream is a sign of infertility and lack of children, and it may indicate chronic illness, and God knows best. Al-Nabulsi says that a woman’s beard in a dream expresses dignity. Her husband and her male children. Or she assumed responsibility after her husband’s death, and God knows best. If a married woman dreams of a beard, she may be separated from her husband, either by his death or divorce. The beard in a pregnant woman’s dream is healthy, God willing. Contemporary dream interpreters say that a woman’s beard in a dream. It expresses her wisdom and sobriety of mind, even if she says she does, and God knows best. If a woman shaves her mustache and beard in a dream, then she changes her words or testifies with false words. If a divorced woman sees that she has a mustache, her marriage will be delayed, and God knows best. Seeing a bearded woman in a dream by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen says: The beard A pregnant woman in a dream is evidence of the birth of a son. Seeing a beard in a widow’s dream is a sign of her marriage again. Shaving a mustache in a woman’s dream is evidence of her beauty and femininity. And whoever leaves his beard gives birth to a son, he will be a master over his people and will be of great fame. If a woman sees that her child has a beard Long, this is an increase in her pride, and her child may get sick, and God knows best. If a woman shaves her husband’s beard in a dream. They are equal in power and authority, or they burden him with many demands, and God knows best. It is said that a beard in a divorced woman’s dream is a sign of postponing the idea of ​​marriage in Present time. Whoever shaved her beard overcame her judgment and started over. The meaning of seeing a long beard in a dreamWhen a man sees in a dream that his beard is longer than it is in reality. This is evidence that people are wise, just, and pious. A long beard in a dream also indicates many Duties and responsibilities of the dreamer. The more the beard accumulates fees and debts on the viewer. Ibn Sirin says if the beard appears long and hairy in the dream. This is evidence of the dreamer’s alienation, his frequent travels, and perhaps his imprisonment, and God knows best. A short beard in a dream symbolizes balance and moderation.

title: What is the interpretation of fried chicken in a dream?

preview.html: Our article today revolves around the interpretation of grilled chicken in a dream. Therefore, in our article today we will shed light on the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi’s dream of grilled chicken, whether it is a man, a married woman, a pregnant woman, or even a single girl, in detail through the encyclopedia, so follow us. Grilled chicken in a dream. Grilled chicken In a dream by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Sirin says that seeing chickens in general is a beautiful, promising, and praiseworthy vision that carries promising meanings and benefits that accrue to the fortuneteller while cooking the chicken. Where Ibn Sirin sees this cooked chicken, whether fried or roasted, in the dreamer’s dream indicates that he will obtain abundant money. Great sustenance is on his way to her, but he will obtain it after suffering and exhaustion. As for whoever sees himself in a dream eating raw chicken meat, this is evidence that this person is accustomed to drowning people with his tongue, which is one of the bad qualities, and God and His Messenger have forbidden it. As for whoever sees in his dream that he is eating the head of a chicken, this is evidence that one of the women close to the dreamer will die soon, and God is Most High and knows the fates and ages. While seeing the dreamer eating a cooked and browned chicken breast in the dream was interpreted as a sign of the opportunity to travel or Work or a new job that the dreamer will get, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. But if the fortuneteller eats in his dream and takes a chicken, this indicates that the fortuneteller will soon marry a girl with good behavior, morals, and good perseverance. If the man is married, this means that he loves his wife very much. As for eating Grilled chicken limbs in a dream is a sign that the dreamer will go to a secluded, miserable and evil place, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Seeing grilled chicken in a dream for single people, interpreters, and interpreters that a single or unmarried girl who sees grilled chicken in her dream is a sign that she will have a very good and abundant diet. And the desires that she has always desired will be satisfied, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Also, for an unmarried girl to see boiled, roasted, or cooked chicken in any way indicates her imminent marriage to a good man of good character, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about food: grilled chicken for single people. If the dreamer eats a grilled chicken in The dream of an unmarried woman is evidence of some problems and difficulties that stand in her way, which may lead to her canceling her engagement or leaving her job. God is great and knows best. However, if a woman is seen eating raw chicken, this indicates that she is far from God and does not remember Him and does not fulfill His duties. She must return and repent to God Almighty, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. It is eating chicken in a dream for pregnant women. Commentators believe that a pregnant woman who saw cooked chicken in her dream, fried or grilled, was evidence of the ease of giving birth to a son with beautiful qualities and appearance, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. As for the woman For a pregnant woman to see a raw chicken in her dream means that she will be exposed to some difficulties and problems in her birth, and God knows best. Eating fried chicken in a married woman’s dream. For a married woman to see cooked chicken in her dream, whether it is baked.

title: Crying in a married woman’s dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Crying in a dream for a married woman Crying is a natural reaction when emotions fluctuate, and when some sad situations occur in life .. We continue to cry. Crying in a dream for a married woman Interpretation scholars say that seeing a married woman crying in a dream indicates the emotions buried inside her and the psychological state she lives in, full of anxiety and fear. If a woman sees herself crying in a dream, this means that she is suffering from many pressures and responsibilities that have accumulated on her. Seeing the same woman crying loudly in a dream means that she has committed many sins and sins in life and always feels remorse. If the fortune teller sees that her husband is crying a lot in a dream, this means that she is going through a bad period and suffers from psychological problems as a result of bearing many responsibilities. If the dreamer cries in a dream without a sound, this means that her affairs will be facilitated. If a woman is pregnant and sees herself crying in a dream, this indicates that her fears dominate the order of birth. As for seeing the dreamer crying and screaming loudly in a dream, this indicates major problems and many pressures in life. Crying in a married woman's dream in Ibn Sirin If A married woman saw that she was crying in a dream, this means good news that she will be happy with in the near future. Also, seeing the dreamer crying and crying loudly indicates that her husband is about to travel outside the country to find a new job opportunity. If the dreamer sees in a dream that she is crying and wearing black clothes, this means that she will spend unhappy and difficult days that affect her psyche. Seeing a woman crying in a dream indicates a long life that will be happy in her life. If the dreamer is sick and sees in a dream that he is crying profusely, this portends him imminent relief and God will bless him with a speedy recovery. Ibn Sirin also confirms that seeing a woman crying a lot in a dream means getting rid of the problems and worries that have accumulated on her. The dreamer, if she sees in a dream that she is crying loudly when she begs God, symbolizes repentance from sins and disobedience and the pure intention that she will enjoy in her life. Crying in a dream for a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman sees herself crying in a dream, this means serious problems and internal anxiety due to thinking about childbirth. Also, seeing the dreamer crying in a dream tells her that the date of birth is approaching and she must prepare for it. Seeing a woman crying in a dream means You are thinking about childbirth and what will happen and you are afraid for the fetus from any harm. If the dreamer sees in a dream that she is crying loudly, this indicates that the relationship with her husband is tense and full of problems and disputes. Seeing a woman crying profusely in a dream means feeling excessive exhaustion and worsening problems. Seeing a woman crying from the heart in front of her husband means that she is suffering from financial problems and pressures due to childbirth expenses. Seeing the dreamer herself crying loudly in a dream and slapping herself is one of the undesirable dreams that indicate divorce and separation from the husband. Interpretation of a dream screaming loudly from the injustice of a married woman If a married woman is seen crying profusely because of the

title: Symbol of yeast in a dream

preview.html: Dough in a prisoner’s dream is salvation and benefit, and we at gptafser.com/ have taken all the interpretations of this vision to reach every person who sees this vision in detail according to his position in his gender. Interpretation of seeing the symbol of dough in a dream for a single girl. Dough in a dream for an unmarried girl symbolizes many meanings: It means that the girl is unmarried if she sees herself attacking the dough with her hand in a dream. The vision indicates marriage to a person who has a lot of money. Whereas if he sees that he is making dough and it is said to him in the girl’s dream. The dream may indicate the ordeal of a marriage very soon. And in the event that he sees that There is a lot of dough in an unmarried girl’s dream. This means that a lot of money will come her way in the near future, God willing. Also, hand dough in a dream is for one girl. An indication of this girl’s good morals and good behavior. Even if she was the only girl, she would enjoy the dough except in The dream. The vision indicated a new experience in her life. Cutting dough in a dream for an unmarried girl is evidence of saving and working to earn. The dough and then bread in the girl’s sleep is an indication of the food that will come to her in the coming days, God willing. But if the unmarried girl sees that A lot of dough in a dream. This is a sign of saving a lot of halal money. See also: Dough in a dream is good news. Interpretation of seeing dough in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman sees dough in a dream. They will get a lot of money and they will get death with money. But if he sees that he is kneading Dough and covering it with his love in a married woman’s dream. The vision indicates the achievement and preparations that she is making for a happy occasion that will occur in the context of her family. If a married woman sees that she is kneading dough and standing in the dream. This is evidence of her saving money and may indicate the marriage of one of her children. The vision of bread can be interpreted In the minaret of a married woman. For the joys and happiness that will enter her home in the coming days, God willing. Dreaming of a lot of dough in a married woman’s dream is an indication of a lot of money and halal profits. A dream about dough and then making many pastries can symbolize the making of many pastries in a married woman’s dream. It is a sign of good deeds that the dreamer will do. We may see this by seeing dough in a married woman’s dream. It indicates the stability of the marital life that the dreamer lives. Interpretation of seeing dough in a dream for a man and its meaning. If a married man sees that it is fermenting in a dream. The vision may indicate To participate in experiments or projects that have great gains in reality. And if he sees that he is kneading and then baking bread in a dream with a married man. It is a sign of abundant sustenance, and the legitimate money that he will earn, God willing. The dream of cutting dough symbolizes a married man. His desire to save And get a lot of money. Whereas if a married man sees dough and it is a lot in the dream. The vision showed the happiness he feels in his private life. We may also see this piece of dough in a married man’s dream. It indicates managing money in its specific locations, that is, a man who knows how to Manage his money in M

title: Interpretation of banks in a dream - seeing a bank in a dream

preview.html: The bank in a dream. Interpretation of money in the bank by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a bank or a bank in a dream for a pregnant woman. Interpretation: The meaning of the market and the bank in the dream. The bank: It may indicate a loan, or it may indicate wealth or the need for others. Interpretation of seeing banks and banking transactions in a dream. Money in a person’s dream expresses psychological strength. And energy, and the interpretation of the dream differs from money or banking depending on the form in which the individual acts in his dream. Seeing a bank in a dream indicates psychological pressure or going through a difficult situation that requires the dreamer to act wisely and control his accounts in an accurate and effective way. Money and securities are interpreted And all types of documents circulating in banks are mostly depicted as the psychological energy, emotions, feelings and sentiments of the person and not the actual bank money. Depositing an amount of money in a bank account can be interpreted as a transfer of positive energy towards a humanitarian or social project, the benefit of which is double for the viewer. Withdrawing amounts is interpreted From bank accounts, it is evidence of a state of weakness that the viewer is exposed to after all his material and moral capabilities have ended. Seeing things in a bank or bank has valuable meanings and value, not just jewelry, safes, and bonds. For example, a fortuneteller may see in a dream a person in the bank who has realistic value to the viewer and seeing him in the dream indicates the need to maintain a good relationship with him or turn it into a relationship of friendship, marriage, kinship, or any relationship that benefits the individual. Seeing thieves or bank robberies In a dream it means that the dreamer is not safe from the vicissitudes of time, even if he thinks things are going well. A thief in a dream can indicate illness, especially if he is covered with a black cover. Entering a bank and depositing money or withdrawing it from the bank in a dream for the purpose of depositing money, this indicates safety and being away from danger. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is stealing money from the bank by taking out the safes With money, gold, and jewelry, this means that he is entering into a matter in which there is danger that will shake his physical or psychological balance, because banks are often protected and tightly closed and any attempts will be discovered. Iron or armored safes in banks express the viewer’s need for protection at this time, because he may be on the verge of On the verge of taking risks, and this requires security and fortification with money or affection, especially paternal or maternal feelings. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she enters a bank or a bank with the intention of earning money, this indicates a lack of trust in some people, especially those who offer themselves to her in marriage. If a married woman sees the bank in her dream, this indicates stability and protection through her husband, and entering the bank is a sign of kindness and livelihood, whether it is a withdrawal or a deposit. Seeing money in a dream can indicate the presence of children. God Almighty said: “Money and children are the jewel of the world.” God Almighty said: Admiring money in a dream is not good or good because it may indicate forbidden money or money that does not contain a blessing or good money.
